brand_info.name: New Balance
brand_info.positioning: An independent global athletic brand positioned at the intersection of performance, craftsmanship, and culture, balancing technical sports innovation with authentic lifestyle relevance.
brand_info.vision: To be the world’s leading responsible brand by empowering people through sport and craftsmanship.
brand_info.mission: Demonstrate responsible leadership, empower people through sport and craftsmanship, and create positive change in communities worldwide.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1906 in Boston, Massachusetts by William J. Riley as the New Balance Arch Support Company, originally focused on arch supports before evolving into athletic footwear and apparel rooted in fit, function, and performance.

brand_values.brand_promise: Deliver performance and style through uncompromising quality, fit, and craftsmanship while remaining true to independent values.
differentiators: Long-standing independence and private ownership enabling long-term brand thinking.
Strong emphasis on fit, function, and performance credibility across running, training, and lifestyle.
Made in USA and Made in UK programs highlighting craftsmanship and local manufacturing.
Cultural relevance through authentic collaborations spanning sport, fashion, and creative communities.
non_negotiables: Maintain independence and avoid trend-chasing that compromises authenticity.
Protect performance credibility and functional integrity across all categories.
Preserve craftsmanship narratives, especially Made in USA and Made in UK.
Keep brand communication grounded, honest, and human.

psychographics.lifestyle: Consumers who value performance, comfort, and authenticity, spanning athletes, creatives, and culturally aware urban audiences.
psychographics.behavior: Research-driven purchasing, brand loyalty, appreciation for heritage models, interest in collaborations and limited releases.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Clear, confident, and understated, balancing performance credibility with cultural awareness.
preferred_structures: Cultural storytelling grounded in real people and communities
tone_dos: Highlight real athletes, makers, and communities

logo.primary_logo: New Balance wordmark with the 'NB' flying logo.
logo.usage_rules: Ensure strong contrast and legibility; avoid distortion or decorative effects.
logo.lockup_behavior: Wordmark or NB logo used depending on context; maintain clarity and scale consistency.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the 'N' in the logo.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Neutral base palette with controlled use of red as a brand accent; campaign palettes may expand but remain grounded.

typography.secondary_font: Condensed sans-serif for headlines and performance emphasis

layout_principles.grid_system: Structured modular grid with functional alignment
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Balanced between product clarity and storytelling
layout_principles.alignment: Functional, grounded compositions with clear product focus

preferred_photographers: Editorial photographers with a grounded, human approach
Studio product photographers emphasizing material and construction
style.camera_feel: Honest and tactile imagery balancing performance clarity with cultural realism.
style.pose_guidelines: Natural athletic stances, relaxed confidence, real movement over exaggerated action.
style.casting_attitude: Real athletes, creatives, and diverse communities; credibility over spectacle.

technical.lighting: Natural or soft studio lighting emphasizing form and materials.
technical.grain: Low to moderate for a tactile feel.
technical.color_grading: Natural, restrained grading with subtle warmth or coolness depending on context.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Fit, construction, and silhouette clarity prioritized.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Functional styling with lifestyle crossover; avoid over-stylization.
avoid: Fashion-only framing that erodes performance credibility

motion_rules.pacing: Measured and purposeful; clarity over speed.

visual_dos: Show real movement and real people

must_remain: New Balance wordmark and NB logo integrity

retail.soundscape: Low-key, contemporary music with a utilitarian feel

platform_behavior.Instagram: Athlete stories, community features, product drops

print.cover_rules: Strong product or human focus; minimal copy
